milestones.title: Breaking ground
milestones.description: Founded as a tower maintenance collective servicing a handful of Gauteng sites with a crew of eight specialists.

milestones.title: Nationwide rollout
milestones.description: Expanded into fibre and microwave design, deploying multi-province PMO teams and launching our first 24/7 command centre.

milestones.title: Intelligence engineered
milestones.description: Introduced analytics and automation practices, integrating AI-driven maintenance and IoT telemetry into client ecosystems.

milestones.title: Continental partnerships
milestones.description: Now supporting operators and enterprises across Southern Africa with modular programmes spanning build, operate, and innovate.

principles.title: Deep field expertise
principles.body: Our multidisciplinary teams unite RF, civil, fibre, and software specialists who understand the realities on-site and in the boardroom.

principles.title: Complexity simplified
principles.body: We design modular playbooks that absorb regulatory, safety, and vendor requirements so your teams can focus on execution.

principles.title: Impact you can measure
principles.body: Every engagement is guided by metrics—from uptime and energy consumption to customer experience—ensuring continuous optimisation.

leadership.name: Nomsa Khumalo

leadership.name: Darren Maseko
